name: true black dark theme
overview: his theme has a dark black glossy background with texts only in shades of white/silver/gray. A true dark theme for the feeling of a monochromatic world of whites on black.

name: Modified quaternion encryption for DICOM image
type: Conference Paper on Image Encryption submitted during Masters and published in IEEE Xplore
overview: This paper studies and implements the existing encryption algorithm on 16-bit DICOM images using quaternion. The modification in algorithm made the execution faster without losing any details or compromising the quality.
